```markdown
9

What is the solution \((x, y)\) to the given system of equations?

$$
y = -12x + 16
$$
$$
y = -20x + 24
$$

A. \((1, 4)\)

B. \((16, 24)\)

C. \((24, 16)\)

D. \((4, 1)\)
```

questions.question_text: What is the solution (x, y) to the given system of equations?
questions.explanation: Set the equations equal: -12x + 16 = -20x + 24. Solve for x: 8x = 8, x = 1. Substitute x=1 into y = -12(1) + 16 = 4. Solution is (1,4).
